name: My Older Sister Left The Computer So I Got On & Found Myself Trying To Coordinate A Raid In A Game & I Don't Play MMO's
name_original: My Older Sister Left The Computer So I Got On & Found Myself Trying To Coordinate A Raid In A Game & I Don't Play MMO's
description:
"My Older Sister Left The Computer So I Got On And Found Myself Trying To Coordinate A Raid In A Game And I Don't Play MMO's" is a game where you attempt to coordinate a raid in an MMO and give people orders while not knowing how to actually accomplish that due to inexperience.

What do skills do? Are the descriptions correct? What do the names mean? What are all these status effects? You don't know, but maybe you can blunder your way to victory.

This game was made for "Games that Shouldn't Be Games Jam 2021". It will be available for purchase for only 24 hours, from midnight PDT on April 1st to midnight PDT April 2nd. It'll be available on future April Fool's Days, but the price will increase each time.
